title: who are your must funnest champs?
body: trying to make a list of champs to get. according to a survey lee sin is. i already have him and tbh hes more "satisfying" to play than fun. I main top / jungle but i like to play the occasional mid. im thinking of getting ornn or kayn when i have enough BE, but idk. tell me what ur favourite champs are xx

replies.body:
btw sorry for broken english im a little dumb
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Zed has to be my fave, He's so mobile and strong it's not funny. Make good plays with your shadows too.

I agree, Zed sure is fun and I reckon auto is quite satisfying. But personally im a supporter and my play style is early support late carry  such as building 2 support item and ap rest on sona{{champion:37}}, that was good times  until sona nerf ;-;
If I can get past the "must funnest" part of the title, I'd say {{champion:57}}  and {{champion:50}}
veigar is fun, if your idea of "fun" is one-shotting any squishes who get a little to close to you
